name: actions
doc:
Various action tasks that demonstrate usual behavior, timeout, and exceptions.

generated from: com.linkedin.restli.examples.greetings.server.ActionsResource

actions.name: failCallbackCall
actions.doc: Action that fails by calling the callback

actions.name: failCallbackThrow
actions.doc: Action that fails by throwing an exception

actions.name: failPromiseCall
actions.doc: Action that fails by calling SettablePromise.fail

actions.name: failPromiseThrow
actions.doc: Action that fails by throwing an exception, returning a promise

actions.name: failTaskCall
actions.doc: Action that fails by calling SettablePromise.fail promise in a task

actions.name: failTaskThrow
actions.doc: Action that fails by throwing an exception, returning a task

actions.name: failThrowInTask
actions.doc: Action that fails by throwing an exception in the task

actions.name: parseq
actions.doc:
Performs three "slow" tasks and collects the results. This uses the passed context
 parameter to execute tasks. The position of the context argument is arbitrary.
Service Returns: Concatenation of binary representation of a, all caps of b, and string value
of c

actions.name: parseq3
actions.doc:
Performs three "slow" tasks and collects the results. This returns a task and lets
 the RestLi server invoke it.
Service Returns: Concatenation of binary representation of a, all caps of b, and string value
of c

actions.name: taskCreationDelay
actions.doc:
Simulates a delay in an asynchronous resource caused by ParSeq execution plan creation. The delay is simulated as
 {@link Thread#sleep(long)} because execution plan creation is a synchronous operation.
Service Returns: Nothing

parameters.name: delay
parameters.doc: the number of milliseconds it will take this resource to create an execution plan

actions.name: taskExecutionDelay
actions.doc:
Simulates a delay in an asynchronous resource. The delay is simulated using a scheduled task (asynchronously).
 That is how a typical async resource looks like in terms of delays.
Service Returns: Nothing

parameters.name: delay
parameters.doc: the number of milliseconds it will take this resource to create an execution plan
